Translations.Text: Whoever shukaye vynahorod U maybutnʹomu, my mnozhymo vynahorody dlya nʹoho. Ta whoever shukaye materialiv tse svit, my dayemo yomu zvidty, todi vin ne otrymuye payovyy vnesok u U maybutnʹomu

Vony sliduyutʹ za idolamy kotrymy ukhvalyuyutʹ dlya nykh relihiyni zakony nikoly ne upovnovazheni BOHOM. Yakshcho b tse bulo ne dlya predetermined rishennya, vony by sudylysʹ nehayno. Diysno, porushnyky zaznaly bolisnoho retribution

Vy pobachyte porushnykiv pilkuvalysʹ pro vse vony zdiysnyly; vse povernetʹsya ta peresliduyutʹ yikh. Yak dlya tsykh khto vvazhaly ta pryviv spravedlyve zhyttya, vony budutʹ u parku Rayu. Vony otrymayutʹ shchob ni vony bazhayutʹ z yikhnʹoho Lorda. Tse yavlyaye soboyu velyke blahoslovennya

Tse yavlyaye soboyu harnu novynu z BOHA do Yoho sluzhbovtsiv shcho vvazhayutʹ ta vedutʹ spravedlyve zhyttya. Skazhitʹ, "ya ne proshu vas dlya budʹ-yakoyi zarplaty. YA zapytuvaty kozhnyy z vas popikluvatysya pro vashykh vlasnykh rodychiv." Budʹ khto khto spravedlyva robota, my mnozhymo yoho vynahorodu dlya tse. BOH Forgiver, Appreciative

vony kazhuchyy, "Vin (Rashad) vyhotovyly brekhnyu pro BOHA!"? Yakshcho BOH willed, Vin mih opechataly vash rozum, ale BOH styraye falsehood ta zatverdzhuye pravdu z Yoho slovamy. Vin znaye tsilkom nayhlybshi dumky
Vin yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto vyznaye kayattya z Yoho sluzhbovtsiv, ta vidsylaye hrikhy. Vin znaye tsilkom vse vy
Vidpovidayuchyy yomu tsey khto vvazhayutʹ ta vedutʹ spravedlyve zhyttya. Vin bude yim zlyvy z Yoho blahoslovennyam. Yak dlya disbelievers, vony zaznaly suvoroho retribution

Yakshcho b BOH zbilʹshyv zapobizhni zakhody Yoho sluzhbovtsi, vony by porushyly na zemli. Tse chomu Vin posylaye tse akuratno obmiryuvav whomever Vin wills. Vin ye tsilkom Cognizant ta Seer Yoho sluzhbovtsiv
Vin yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto posylaye vnyz doshch pislya vony despaired, ta rozpovsyudzhuye Yoho myloserdya. Vin yavlyaye soboyu tilʹky Keruvaty, Naybilʹsh Praiseworthy
Sered Yoho dokaziv yavlyaye soboyu stvorennya neba ta zemli, ta stvorinnya Vin rozpovsyudzhuyetʹsya u nykh. Vin vmiye sklykaty yikh, koly Vin wills
